mean_cn: n. 酒精饮料，麻醉品；  adj. 醉人的，麻醉的，沉醉的
mean_en: something (such as an acoholic drink) that causes people to become excited or confused and less able to control what they say or do :an intoxicating substance
sentence: Sparkling wine is an intoxicant, if you drink too much, you'll be drunk!
sentence_trans: 起泡酒是酒精饮料，喝太多你会醉的！
word_etyma: in进入 + toxic毒 + ant...的 → intoxicant酒精中毒的
